Quality Education.reason: This course 'provides freshmen with sufficient training in speaking and writing and develops teamwork skills' and 'to improve students’ basic written communication skills'.
evidence: This course provides freshmen with sufficient training in speaking and writing and develops teamwork skills.
It aims to enhance students’ ability to express ideas and respond to common subjects in life and to improve students’ basic written communication skills.

The oral training will cover pronunciation, articulation, and speech delivery, and the writing training focuses on the basic format and structure of a paragraph, knowledge of collocation, and applications of grammatical rules.

Quality Education.reason: The course provides "sufficient training in speaking and writing" to "enhance students’ ability to express ideas" and "acquire essential oral and written communication skills".

enhance students’ ability to express ideas
acquire essential oral and written communication skills
